profile:
THE PAINTING COMPANY WITH THE 1 DAY DIFFERENCE 

Imagine leaving for work in the morning and coming home to a freshly painted space. That’s exactly what you’ll experience with WOW 1 DAY PAINTING. We’ve perfected our painting process, which means we’re able to give you a quality paint job in just 1 day. Our customers love us because we really deliver on our promise of SPEED + QUALITY = WOW.

Here’s what you can expect when you work with our painting company:

Friendly, uniformed painters who truly care - NO Sub-Contractors like many of our competitors
Exceptional communication
Jobs that start and finish on time

A PAINTING COMPANY LIKE NO OTHER

At WOW 1 DAY PAINTING, we offer a fast, high-quality solution for all of your interior or exterior residential and commercial painting projects. 

What makes us different from other painting companies? Our smart painting process and precision house painters eliminate all of the hassle and mess you usually get with painting projects. Here’s the secret: We make sure to bring enough painters to complete the work quickly, so you can get a freshly painted space without the disruption you typically see with large painting projects.

Remember when you go with Home Painters we value your business and referrals and are committed to getting it done right the first time. GUARANTEED!

Why use WOW 1 DAY PAINTING to paint your house/office?

• LIFETIME GUARANTEE On All Interior Painting
• Full Workplace Safety Insurance Board (WSIB)
• 5 Million Liability Insurance
• Fully Bonded Workers
• 10+ Years Experience in the Painting Industry
• Thousands of Satisfied Clients
• Top Quality Paints 
• Paper & Drop sheets to Protect Your Floors and Belongings
• 100% Satisfaction Guaranteed!!

Interior Painting Services Include:

• Painting (i.e. walls, trim, doors, floors, ceilings, etc.)
• Staining (i.e. banisters, hardwood floors, cabinets, etc.)
• Faux finishing
• Stucco Painting and Repair
• Wallpapering and Removal
• Drywall Repair and Replacement
• Plaster

Exterior Painting Services Include:

• Painting Exterior Surfaces (ie. windows, brick, doors, eaves, soffits, aluminum siding, etc.)
• Deck/Fence Staining and Refinishing
• Power Washing
• Caulking

profile:
At Painttastic we specialize in indoor painting services, wallpaper installation, and popcorn ceiling removal. Additionally, minor patch and drywall repairs to any wall can be added to any service we offer.

We are a verified Homestars company and pay close attention to detail and consider ourselves perfectionists when it comes to our workmanship. We pride ourselves in providing paintastic quality service that our customers trust to transform their homes.

Our core values consist of quality, efficiency, and precision. Our customer's needs are prioritized and reflected in our quotation process. Based on our experience we have determined that it is best for our team to assess the requested job in person, in order to provide an accurate estimate and timeline of the project.

If you are a first-time Client we offer an additional 10% discount on your first service!

Please do not hesitate to contact us through Homestars,  via email at painttasticc@gmail.com, or by phoning us at 647-970-9276
We look forward to discussing your painttastic vision further!
services:
- Indoor painting
- popcorn ceiling removal
- minor patch & drywall repair
- wood flooring installation

profile:
ABOUT US
Ellis Wall Finishes is a well-established local company located in Toronto and its vicinities. We offer high quality and professional painting, decorative wall finishes and venetian plaster services.

 

We have the experience, expertise and dedication to get your job done right and delivered on time and on budget. Our employees are certified and offer professional services on diverse projects.

​

Our priority is customer satisfaction and for this reason, we use only the best quality paints and materials on the market. Completing the project in a timely and efficient manner ensuring the highest standards is top priority for Ellis Wall Finishes.

​

We provide a free onsite or remote estimate and initial consultation to ensure that we are the right fit for you and your house or business.

Our goal is to help you create the space of your dreams. We do this by providing the very highest quality products and working directly with you to capture your vision.

Hey! Arran MacDonald here. Thank you for taking the time to check out our business. 

I began painting in university for a local business while I was finishing my bachelors degree. I quickly gained a passion for providing exceptional results for my clients. There is no better feeling than producing a product that a client loves. That is what I love to do! 

Here at HECRA, we pride ourselves on not only providing exceptional results, but providing our clients with tremendous customer service. 

You matter. We value you and your happiness. We believe that open communication and honesty lead to the BEST service experience. Please do not hestiate to ask questions or express concerns. WE WANT YOU TO BE HAPPY!

profile:
LAS SERVICES offers excellent quality of work. Professional and Reliable painters. We are Insured and Registered Company with WSIB Coverage that offers Interior and Exterior Painting/Staining Residential, Custom Houses, Rentals and Commercial Services. We aim to make our customers happy with highly satisfactory. Advise consumers on colors and choice of wall coverings. Repair cracks and holes. Prepare, clean and sand surfaces to be painted. Apply paint, wallpaper and other materials and finishes to interior and exterior surfaces
Measure, cut and apply wallpaper and other fabric to walls. Drywall repair. Paint cabinets and stairs. Painters have more than 5 years of experience. We are a full service paint company with impeccable standards and the eye for every detail. We also offer Cleaning Services in Simcoe County, we are reliable, and organized, who strives to get the job done in a neat and timely manner. We provide all kinds of cleaning work around the house and offices. We provide necessary supplies and equipment. Service is available on a weekly, bi-weekly, and monthly basis as well as move in/ move out and one time cleans if needed. We would be happy to show you some of our work or references is available upon request. We use Benjamin Moore and Sherwin Williams paint products and we will set up a consultation to go all your project needs. 

Hours of Operation: 8:00 am to 6:00 pm Monday to Sunday
